wikipedia_page.main: Ali Mobasheri (Persian: علی مباشری) is a Professor of Musculoskeletal Physiology at University of Surrey in England.  He was educated at Dulwich College an independent school for boys in Dulwich, southeast London and is included on the List of Old Alleynians. He obtained his BSc from Imperial College London, his MSc from the University of Toronto and his DPhil from Wolfson College, Oxford at the University of Oxford. He has published more than 250 papers  in leading scientific journals.

response: * Ali Mobasheri associate professor and reader at the University of Nottingham
